member.summary: Forward NTT, in-place.

member.summary: Inverse NTT and multiplication by Montgomery factor 2^32.

member.summary: Inplace reduction of all coefficients of polynomial to representative in [-6283008,6283008].

member.name: M:PQnet.MlDsaBase.poly_caddq(PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly)
member.summary: For all coefficients of in/out polynomial add Q if coefficient is negative.

member.name: M:PQnet.MlDsaBase.poly_add(PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly,PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly,PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly)
member.summary: Add polynomials. No modular reduction is performed.

member.name: M:PQnet.MlDsaBase.poly_sub(PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly,PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly,PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly)
member.summary: Subtract polynomials. No modular reduction is performed.
member.param: Second polynominal to be subtracted from first

member.summary: Multiply polynomial by 2^D without modular reduction.
member.remarks: Multiply polynomial by 2^D without modular reduction.

member.name: M:PQnet.MlDsaBase.poly_ntt(PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly)
member.summary: Inplace forward NTT. Coefficients can grow by 8*Q in absolute value.

member.name: M:PQnet.MlDsaBase.poly_invntt_tomont(PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly)
member.summary: Inplace inverse NTT and multiplication by 2^{32}.
member.remarks: Input coefficients need to be less than Q in absolute value and output coefficients are again bounded by Q.

member.name: M:PQnet.MlDsaBase.poly_pointwise_montgomery(PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly,PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly,PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly)
member.summary: Pointwise multiplication of polynomials in NTT domain representation and multiplication of resulting polynomial by 2^{-32}.

member.name: M:PQnet.MlDsaBase.poly_power2round(PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly,PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly,PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly)
member.summary: For all coefficients c of the input polynomial, compute c0, c1 such that c mod Q = c1*2^D + c0 with -2^{D-1} < c0 <= 2^{D-1}.
member.remarks: Assumes coefficients to be standard representatives.

member.name: M:PQnet.MlDsaBase.poly_decompose(PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly,PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly,PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly)
member.summary: For all coefficients c of the input polynomial, compute high and low bits c0, c1 such c mod Q = c1*ALPHA + c0 with -ALPHA/2 < c0 <= ALPHA/2 except c1 = (Q-1)/ALPHA where we set c1 = 0 and -ALPHA/2 <= c0 = c mod Q - Q < 0.
member.remarks: Assumes coefficients to be standard representatives.

member.name: M:PQnet.MlDsaBase.poly_make_hint(PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly,PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly,PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly)
member.summary: Compute hint polynomial. The coefficients of which indicate whether the low bits of the corresponding coefficient of the input polynomial overflow into the high bits.
member.returns: number of 1 bits

member.name: M:PQnet.MlDsaBase.poly_use_hint(PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly,PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly,PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly)
member.summary: Use hint polynomial to correct the high bits of a polynomial
member.param: output polynomial with corrected high bits

member.name: M:PQnet.MlDsaBase.poly_chknorm(PQnet.MlDsaBase.Poly,System.Int32)
member.summary: Check infinity norm of polynomial against given bound.
member.returns: 0 if norm is strictly smaller than B <= (Q-1)/8 and 1 otherwise.
member.remarks: Assumes input coefficients were reduced by reduce32().

member.name: M:PQnet.MlDsaBase.rej_uniform(System.Int32[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Sample uniformly random coefficients in [0, Q-1] by performing rejection sampling on array of random bytes
member.param: number of coefficients to be sampled
length of array of random bytes

member.name: M:PQnet.MlDsaBase.montgomery_reduce(System.Int64)
member.summary: Montgomery reduction; given a 64-bit integer a, computes 32-bit integer congruent to a * R^-1 mod Q,
member.returns: r
member.remarks: For finite field element a with -2^{31}Q <= a <= Q*2^31, compute r \equiv a*2^{-32} (mod Q) such that -Q < r < Q.

member.name: M:PQnet.MlDsaBase.reduce32(System.Int32)
member.summary: Reduce a coefficient a mod Q.
member.returns: r
member.remarks: For finite field element a with a <= 2^{31} - 2^{22} - 1, compute r \equiv a (mod Q) such that -6283008 <= r <= 6283008.

member.name: M:PQnet.MlDsaBase.caddq(System.Int32)
member.summary: Add Q if input coefficient is negative.
member.returns: r

member.name: M:PQnet.MlDsaBase.freeze(System.Int32)
member.returns: r
member.remarks: For finite field element a, compute standard representative r = a mod^+ Q.
